snippet: Walmart said it would test a new unlimited shipping service for online shoppers this summer that will be priced below Amazon’s widely popular $99 per year Prime service.
abstract: Walmart announces plans to trial unlimited shipping service for online customers that will be priced below Amazon’s $99 per year Prime service.
lead_paragraph: Walmart said it would test a new unlimited shipping service for online shoppers this summer that will be priced below Amazon’s widely popular $99 per year Prime service.

headline.main: Walmart Plans to Test Unlimited Shipping Service
headline.print_headline: Walmart Plans to Test Unlimited Shipping Service
